expert.description:
{Expert Summon Boat}

Summons an existing, friendly, unoccupied boat from anywhere in the world to your location.  If no boats exist, one is created.

{Expert Scuttle Boat}

Destroys a boat you own.  Use with caution, the effects are permanent.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Visions}

Gives you a basic idea of the strength of an opposing garrison.  In the case of nearby wandering monsters, gives you exact numbers of troops and tells you if they would be willing to join your hero.  Allows you to view a nearby enemy hero's primary skill statistics, creature type and quantity, as if the hero was part of your kingdom.

basic.description:
{Basic Visions}

Gives you a basic idea of the strength of an opposing hero or garrison.  In the case of nearby wandering monsters, gives you exact numbers of troops and tells you if they would be willing to join your hero.

expert.description:
{Expert Visions}

Gives you exact numbers of wandering monsters and tells you if they would be willing to join your hero.  Allows you to view a nearby enemy hero's primary skill statistics, creature type and quantity, as if the hero was part of your kingdom, as well as a nearby town's statistics, garrison creatures and quantity.

none.description:
{Visions}

Gives you a basic idea of the strength of an opposing army, hero, or garrison.

advanced.description:
{Advanced View Earth}

Reveals the location of all resources and mines to the caster.

basic.description:
{Basic View Earth}

Reveals the location of all resources to the caster.

expert.description:
{Expert View Earth}

Reveals the location of all resources and mines and reveals all terrain to the caster.

none.description:
{View earth}

Reveals the location of all resources to the caster.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Disguise}

Makes all units in your army look like your most powerful unit to enemies trying to view your hero.  Numbers in each group appear as zero.

basic.description:
{Basic Disguise}

Makes all units in your army look like your most powerful unit to enemies trying to view your hero.  Numbers in each group are unchanged.

expert.description:
{Expert Disguise}

Makes all units in your army look like the most powerful unit affiliated to your hero type to enemies trying to view your hero.  Numbers in each group appear as zero.

none.description:
{Disguise}

Gives false information to an enemy attempting to view your hero.

advanced.description:
{Advanced View Air}

Reveals the location of all unclaimed artifacts, plus enemy heroes to the caster.

basic.description:
{Basic View Air}

Reveals the location of all unclaimed artifacts to the caster.

expert.description:
{Expert View Air}

Reveals the location of all unclaimed artifacts, plus enemy heroes and towns to the caster.

none.description:
{View Air}

Reveals the location of all unclaimed artifacts to the caster.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Fly}

Allows your army to use most of its movement to fly over obstacles.  You must land at the end of the turn.

basic.description:
{Basic Fly}

Allows your army to use part of its movement to fly over obstacles.  You must land at the end of the turn.

expert.description:
{Expert Fly}

Allows your army to use up to all of its movement to fly over obstacles.  You must land at the end of the turn.

none.description:
{Fly}

Allows your army to use part of its movement to fly over obstacles.  You must land at the end of the turn.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Water Walk}

Allows your army to use most of its movement to walk across bodies of water.  You must end your movement on dry land.

basic.description:
{Basic Water Walk}

Allows your army to use part of its movement to walk across bodies of water.  You must end your movement on dry land.

expert.description:
{Expert Water Walk}

Allows your army to use up to all of its movement to walk across bodies of water.  You must end your movement on dry land.

none.description:
{Water Walk}

Allows your army to use part of its movement to walk across bodies of water.  You must end your movement on dry land.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Dimension Door}

Three times per day, you may teleport your hero to a visible, unoccupied location on the adventure map.

basic.description:
{Basic Dimension Door}

Twice per day, you may teleport your hero to a visible, unoccupied location on the adventure map.

expert.description:
{Expert Dimension Door}

Four times per day, you may teleport your hero to a visible, unoccupied location on the adventure map.

none.description:
{Dimension Door}

Once per day, you may teleport your hero to a visible, unoccupied location on the adventure map.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Town Portal}

Teleports your hero to any friendly town.  The town must be unoccupied.

basic.description:
{Basic Town Portal}

Teleports your hero to the nearest friendly town.  The town must be unoccupied.

expert.description:
{Expert Town Portal}

Teleports your hero to any friendly town.  The town must be unoccupied.

none.description:
{Town Portal}

Teleports your hero to the nearest friendly town.  The town must be unoccupied.

basic.description:
{Basic Magic Arrow}

Causes a bolt of magical energy to strike the selected unit.

none.description:
{Magic Arrow}

Causes a bolt of magical energy to strike the selected unit.

basic.description:
{Basic Ice Bolt}

Drains the body heat from the selected enemy unit.

none.description:
{Ice Bolt}

Drains the body heat from the selected enemy unit.

basic.description:
{Basic Lightning Bolt}

Causes a bolt of lightning to strike the selected unit.

none.description:
{Lightning Bolt}

Causes a bolt of lightning to strike the selected unit.

basic.description:
{Basic Implosion}

Inflicts massive damage to a single creature stack.

none.description:
{Implosion}

Inflicts massive damage to a single creature stack.

basic.description:
{Basic Chain Lightning}

Fires a bolt of lightning at the selected unit which then travels to the nearest adjacent unit, inflicting half damage before traveling to the next adjacent unit, again inflicting half damage, etc.  Strikes four units.

none.description:
{Chain Lightning}

Fires a bolt of lightning at the selected unit which then travels to the nearest adjacent unit, inflicting half damage before traveling to the next adjacent unit, again inflicting half damage, etc.  Strikes four units.

basic.description:
{Basic Frost Ring}

Drains the body heat of any units adjacent to the target location, without inflicting damage on the target.

none.description:
{Frost Ring}

Drains the body heat of any units adjacent to the target location, without inflicting damage on the target.

basic.description:
{Basic Fireball}

Causes the selected target to burst into flames, inflicting fire damage to the target and any adjacent units.

none.description:
{Fireball}

Causes the selected target to burst into flames, inflicting fire damage to the target and any adjacent units.

basic.description:
{Basic Inferno}

Causes a huge blast of fire to strike the selected target.  Don't be near this when it goes off!

none.description:
{Inferno}

Causes a huge blast of fire to strike the selected target.  Don't be near this when it goes off!

basic.description:
{Basic Meteor Shower}

Causes a meteor shower to rain down on the selected target and any adjacent units.

none.description:
{Meteor Shower}

Causes a meteor shower to rain down on the selected target and any adjacent units.

basic.description:
{Basic Death Ripple}

Sends a wave of death across the battlefield which damages all non-undead units.

none.description:
{Death Ripple}

Sends a wave of death across the battlefield which damages all non-undead units.

basic.description:
{Basic Destroy Undead}

Attempts to destroy any undead creatures on the battlefield.

none.description:
{Destroy Undead}

Attempts to destroy any undead creatures on the battlefield.

basic.description:
{Basic Armageddon}

Rains fire down upon the battlefield, damaging all units.

none.description:
{Armageddon}

Rains fire down upon the battlefield, damaging all units.

advanced.description:
{Titan's Lightning Bolt}

Does 600 points of damage at no spell cost to the spellcaster.

basic.description:
{Titan's Lightning Bolt}

Does 600 points of damage at no spell cost to the spellcaster.

expert.description:
{Titan's Lightning Bolt}

Does 600 points of damage at no spell cost to the spellcaster.

none.description:
{Titan's Lightning Bolt}

Does 600 points of damage at no spell cost to the spellcaster.

basic.description:
{Basic Shield}

Shields a selected unit, reducing the amount of damage received from hand-to-hand attacks.

none.description:
{Shield}

Shields a selected unit, reducing the amount of damage received from hand-to-hand attacks.

basic.description:
{Basic Air Shield}

Shields a selected unit, reducing the amount of damage received from ranged attacks.

none.description:
{Air Shield}

Shields a selected unit, reducing the amount of damage received from ranged attacks.

basic.description:
{Basic Fire Shield}

Cast on a friendly unit, it does not provide any additional protection, but any enemy attacking through the fire shield will suffer damage equal to a portion of what it inflicts.

none.description:
{Fire Shield}

Cast on a friendly unit, it does not provide any additional protection, but any enemy attacking through the fire shield will suffer damage equal to a portion of what it inflicts.

basic.description:
{Basic Protection from Air}

Protects the selected unit, reducing damage received from Air spells.

none.description:
{Protection from Air}

Protects the selected unit, reducing damage received from Air spells.

basic.description:
{Basic Protection from Fire}

Protects the selected unit, reducing damage received from Fire spells.

none.description:
{Protection from Fire}

Protects the selected unit, reducing damage received from Fire spells.

basic.description:
{Basic Protection from Water}

Protects the selected unit, reducing damage received from Water spells.

none.description:
{Protection from Water}

Protects the selected unit, reducing damage received from Water spells.

basic.description:
{Basic Protection from Earth}

Protects the selected unit, reducing damage received from Earth spells.

none.description:
{Protection from Earth}

Protects the selected unit, reducing damage received from Earth spells.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Anti-magic}

Protects the selected unit all but the most powerful spells.

basic.description:
{Basic Anti-magic}

Protects the selected unit from all low level spells.

expert.description:
{Expert Anti-magic}

Protects the selected unit from all spells.

none.description:
{Anti-magic}

Protects the selected unit from all low level spells.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Magic Mirror}

Reflects hostile spells towards a random enemy creature 30% of the time.

basic.description:
{Basic Magic Mirror}

Reflects hostile spells towards a random enemy creature 20% of the time.

expert.description:
{Expert Magic Mirror}

Reflects hostile spells towards a random enemy creature 40% of the time.

none.description:
{Magic Mirror}

Reflects hostile spells towards a random enemy creature 20% of the time.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Bless}

Causes the selected unit to inflict greater than their normal maximum damage in combat.

basic.description:
{Basic Bless}

Causes the selected unit to inflict maximum damage in combat.

expert.description:
{Expert Bless}

Causes all friendly units to inflict greater than their normal maximum damage in combat.

none.description:
{Bless}

Causes the selected unit to inflict maximum damage in combat.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Curse}

Causes the selected enemy unit to inflict less than their normal minimum damage in combat.

basic.description:
{Basic Curse}

Causes the selected enemy unit to inflict minimum damage in combat.

expert.description:
{Expert Curse}

Causes all enemy units to inflict less than their normal minimum damage in combat.

none.description:
{Curse}

Causes the selected enemy unit to inflict minimum damage in combat.

basic.description:
{Basic Bloodlust}

Increases the hand-to-hand damage inflicted by the selected unit.

none.description:
{Bloodlust}

Increases the hand-to-hand damage inflicted by the selected unit.

basic.description:
{Basic Precision}

Increases the ranged attack damage inflicted by the selected unit.

none.description:
{Precision}

Increases the ranged attack damage inflicted by the selected unit.

basic.description:
{Basic Weakness}

Reduces the selected enemy unit's attack strength.

none.description:
{Weakness}

Reduces the selected enemy unit's attack strength.

basic.description:
{Basic Stone Skin}

Increases the selected unit's defense strength.

none.description:
{Stone Skin}

Increases the selected unit's defense strength.

basic.description:
{Basic Disrupting Ray}

Reduces the selected enemy unit's defense strength.  A single enemy may be targeted multiple times by this spell.

none.description:
{Disrupting Ray}

Reduces the selected enemy unit's defense strength.  A single enemy may be targeted multiple times by this spell.

basic.description:
{Basic Prayer}

Bestows a bonus to the attack strength, defense strength and speed of the selected unit.

none.description:
{Prayer}

Bestows a bonus to the attack strength, defense strength and speed of the selected unit.

basic.description:
{Basic Mirth}

Increases the selected unit's morale.

none.description:
{Mirth}

Increases the selected unit's morale.

basic.description:
{Basic Sorrow}

Reduces the morale of the selected enemy unit.

none.description:
{Sorrow}

Reduces the morale of the selected enemy unit.

basic.description:
{Basic Fortune}

Increases the selected unit's luck.

none.description:
{Fortune}

Increases the selected unit's luck.

{Misfortune}

Reduces the luck of the selected enemy unit.

basic.description:
{Basic Haste}

Increases the speed of the selected unit.

none.description:
{Haste}

Increases the speed of the selected unit.

basic.description:
{Basic Slow}

Reduces the speed of the selected enemy unit.

none.description:
{Slow}

Reduces the speed of the selected enemy unit.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Slayer}

Increases the amount of damage inflicted by a unit when fighting against Dragons, Behemoths, Hydras, Devils and Angels.

basic.description:
{Basic Slayer}

Increases the amount of damage inflicted by a unit when fighting against Dragons, Behemoths and Hydras.

expert.description:
{Expert Slayer}

Increases the amount of damage inflicted by a unit when fighting against Dragons, Behemoths, Hydras, Devils, Angels and Titans.

none.description:
{Slayer}

Increases the amount of damage inflicted by a unit when fighting against Dragons, Behemoths and Hydras.

basic.description:
{Basic Frenzy}

Selected troop intentionally lowers its defenses to increase the ferocity of its attack.

none.description:
{Frenzy}

Selected troop intentionally lowers its defenses to increase the ferocity of its attack.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Counterstrike}

The selected unit will retaliate against two additional attacks each round.

basic.description:
{Basic Counterstrike}

The selected unit will retaliate against one additional attack each round.

expert.description:
{Expert Counterstrike}

All friendly units will retaliate against two additional attacks each round.

none.description:
{Counterstrike}

The selected unit will retaliate against one additional attack each round.

basic.description:
{Basic Berserk}

The targeted unit will randomly attack the nearest unit, be it friend or foe.

none.description:
{Berserk}

The targeted unit will randomly attack the nearest unit, be it friend or foe.

basic.description:
{Basic Hypnotize}

Puts an enemy unit temporarily under your control.

none.description:
{Hypnotize}

Puts an enemy unit temporarily under your control.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Forgetfulness}

Causes the selected enemy unit to forget to use its ranged attack in combat.

basic.description:
{Basic Forgetfulness}

Half of the selected enemy unit forgets to use its ranged attack.

expert.description:
{Expert Forgetfulness}

Causes all enemy troops to forget to use their ranged attack in combat.

none.description:
{Forgetfulness}

Half of the selected enemy unit forgets to use its ranged attack.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Blind}

Blinds a creature so that it cannot move and causes it to counterattack at one-quarter of its normal attack strength.  Blindness persists until the unit is attacked or dispelled.

basic.description:
{Basic Blind}

Blinds a creature so that it cannot move and causes it to counterattack at half its normal attack strength.  Blindness persists until the unit is attacked or dispelled.

expert.description:
{Expert Blind}

Blinds a creature so that it cannot move or counterattack.  Blindness persists until the unit is attacked or dispelled.

none.description:
{Blind}

Blinds a creature so that it cannot move and causes it to counterattack at half its normal attack strength.  Blindness persists until the unit is attacked or dispelled.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Quicksand}

Randomly places six small patches of quicksand on the battlefield which are only visible to the caster and creatures native to the terrain.  Walking into quicksand ends a unit's movement for the turn and makes it visible to all.

basic.description:
{Basic Quicksand}

Randomly places four small patches of quicksand on the battlefield which are only visible to the caster and creatures native to the terrain.  Walking into quicksand ends a unit's movement for the turn and makes it visible to all.

expert.description:
{Expert Quicksand}

Randomly places eight small patches of quicksand on the battlefield which are only visible to the caster and creatures native to the terrain.  Walking into quicksand ends a unit's movement for the turn and makes it visible to all.

none.description:
{Quicksand}

Randomly places four small patches of quicksand on the battlefield which are only visible to the caster and creatures native to the terrain.  Walking into quicksand ends a unit's movement for the turn and makes it visible to all.

basic.description:
{Basic Land Mine}

Randomly places four small areas of landmines on the battlefield which are only visible to the caster and creatures native to the terrain.  It inflicts damage to any unit walking over it.

none.description:
{Land Mine}

Randomly places four small areas of landmines on the battlefield which are only visible to the caster and creatures native to the terrain.  It inflicts damage to any unit walking over it.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Force Field}

Places a medium sized Force Field on the battlefield at a point specified by the caster.

basic.description:
{Basic Force Field}

Places a small Force Field on the battlefield at a point specified by the caster.

expert.description:
{Expert Force Field}

Places a medium sized Force Field on the battlefield at a point specified by the caster.

none.description:
{Force Field}

Places a small Force Field on the battlefield at a point specified by the caster.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Fire Wall}

Places a medium sized wildfire on the battlefield at a point specified by the caster.  Any units passing through the wall take damage.

basic.description:
{Basic Fire Wall}

Places a small wildfire on the battlefield at a point specified by the caster.  Any units passing through the wall take damage.

expert.description:
{Expert Fire Wall}

Places a medium sized wildfire on the battlefield at a point specified by the caster.  Any units passing through the wall take damage.

none.description:
{Fire Wall}

Places a small wildfire on the battlefield at a point specified by the caster.  Any units passing through the wall take damage.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Earthquake}

Randomly damages three sections of castle wall in combat.

basic.description:
{Basic Earthquake}

Randomly damages two sections of castle wall in combat.

expert.description:
{Expert Earthquake}

Randomly damages four sections of castle wall in combat.

none.description:
{Earthquake}

Randomly damages two sections of castle wall in combat.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Dispel}

Removes all spell effects from a friendly or hostile creature.

basic.description:
{Basic Dispel}

Removes all spell effects from a friendly creature.

expert.description:
{Expert Dispel}

Removes all spell effects from all units on the battlefield.

none.description:
{Dispel}

Removes all spell effects from a friendly creature.

basic.description:
{Basic Cure}

Removes all negative spell effects and heals a small number of hit points on the selected unit.

none.description:
{Cure}

Removes all negative spell effects and heals a small number of hit points on the selected unit.

basic.description:
{Basic Resurrection}

Resurrects units in the selected group by restoring a fixed number of hit points to the target.

none.description:
{Resurrection}

Resurrects units in the selected group by restoring a fixed number of hit points to the target.

basic.description:
{Basic Animate Dead}

Re-animates any destroyed undead in the selected group by restoring a fixed number of hit points to the target.

none.description:
{Animate Dead}

Re-animates any destroyed undead in the selected group by restoring a fixed number of hit points to the target.

basic.description:
{Basic Sacrifice}

Destroys a friendly creature group in order to resurrect a dead group.  Number of resurrected creatures depends on the caster's spell power and the health of the destroyed stack.

none.description:
{Sacrifice}

Destroys a friendly creature group in order to resurrect a dead group.  Number of resurrected creatures depends on the caster's spell power and the health of the destroyed stack.

expert.description:
{Expert Teleport}

Teleports any friendly unit to any unoccupied spot on the battlefield.

none.description:
{Teleport}

Teleports any friendly unit to any unoccupied spot on the battlefield.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Remove Obstacle}

Removes any normal obstacle (trees, rocks, etc.) or Fire Wall of the caster's choice from the battlefield.

basic.description:
{Basic Remove Obstacle}

Removes any normal obstacle (trees, rocks, etc.) of the caster's choice from the battlefield.

expert.description:
{Expert Remove Obstacle}

Removes any normal or magical obstacle of the caster's choice from the battlefield.

none.description:
{Remove Obstacle}

Removes any normal obstacle (trees, rocks, etc.) of the caster's choice from the battlefield.

basic.description:
{Basic Summon Fire Elemental}

Allows you to summon fire elementals.  Once cast, no other elemental types may be summoned.

none.description:
{Summon Fire Elemental}

Allows you to summon fire elementals.  Once cast, no other elemental types may be summoned.

basic.description:
{Basic Summon Earth Elemental}

Allows you to summon earth elementals.  Once cast, no other elemental types may be summoned.

none.description:
{Summon Earth Elemental}

Allows you to summon earth elementals.  Once cast, no other elemental types may be summoned.

basic.description:
{Basic Summon Water Elemental}

Allows you to summon water elementals.  Once cast, no other elemental types may be summoned.

none.description:
{Summon Water Elemental}

Allows you to summon water elementals.  Once cast, no other elemental types may be summoned.

basic.description:
{Basic Summon Air Elemental}

Allows you to summon air elementals.  Once cast, no other elemental types may be summoned.

none.description:
{Summon Air Elemental}

Allows you to summon air elementals.  Once cast, no other elemental types may be summoned.
